short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view the time in different timezones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your digital world with "Simply Timezones"! 

Whether you're scheduling meetings with colleagues around the globe, coordinating with remote team members, or just curious about the current time in various parts of the world, this extension is your hassle-free solution.

Features:

🌍 Instantly view the time in your local timezone and UTC.
⏰ Choose from a curated list of the world's most popular timezones.
🕐 Display times in both standard and military formats.
💼 Seamlessly integrate with your browser for quick access.
🔄 Automatically syncs your preferred timezone across devices.
Stay globally connected without the fuss. Install "Simply Timezones" today and make every moment count!
